headline: A New Chapter Awaits – Take Centre Stage in F1® 25; An Epic Formula 1® Blockbuster
summary: REDWOOD CITY, Calif., March 26, 2025--Electronic Arts Inc. (NASDAQ: EA) invites players to create headlines as a new chapter of Formula 1® begins with F1® 25, an official game of the 2025 FIA Formula One World Championship™, coming to PlayStation®5, Xbox Series X|S and PC on May 30. Take the spotlight in the latest instalment of the fan-favourite story mode, Braking Point, with Konnersport now battling for championships, as a dramatic event throws the team into chaos.
